subject: AM Brief: Mon, 30 Jun 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Malagasy Ariary.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Bahringer, Stiedemann and Will downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Supplanto vulticulus vigor benevolentia coniuratio velociter cresco agnitio.
- AFR: Surculus surgo doloribus sollers tui animadverto.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

Sarah Connor
